props.title: Unlock Growth with Smart Marketing
props.description: Discover the ultimate marketing resource hub designed exclusively for solopreneurs—gain expert strategies, actionable tools, and proven tactics to attract customers, increase sales, and build your brand confidently without hiring a team.

props.comparisonHeadline: Smart Video Creation vs Time-Consuming Edits

visualBuilderAdvantages.advantageDescription: Generate high-impact, platform-optimized videos in minutes using AI-driven templates tailored for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and more.
Automate video editing and content personalization with smart tools that save you hours and keep your feed fresh daily.
Boost your social presence with videos designed to captivate your audience, increase shares, and drive conversions faster than traditional methods.

props.comparisonSubheadline: See how VidBot revolutionizes social media content with fast, AI-powered video creation tailored to your brand
props.closingCallToActionText: Join thousands transforming their social media with VidBot’s AI-powered video generator tool

headerContent.description: Discover tailored marketing tools and resources curated exclusively for solopreneurs. Empower your brand with expert strategies, actionable insights, and easy-to-use solutions designed to accelerate growth and amplify your impact.

solutionItems.solutionDescription: Access an expertly crafted collection of marketing plans and templates specifically designed to help solo founders save time and achieve measurable results without overwhelm.
Follow easy-to-understand tutorials that walk you through setting up campaigns, optimizing conversions, and building your brand presence—even if you’re new to marketing.
Streamline your marketing efforts with a centralized platform built for solopreneurs, featuring customizable templates, analytics tracking, and community support to fuel your business growth.

props.title: Simple Pricing
props.description: Tailored pricing made to empower solopreneurs with powerful marketing resources at every step.

faqs.answer: Our platform combines smart marketing tools with expert resources so you can effortlessly plan, launch, and grow your solo business with confidence.
faqs.question: How does this work?

faqs.answer: Experience quicker marketing wins, expertly crafted templates, and step-by-step guides that save time and empower your growth without overwhelm.
faqs.question: What are the benefits?

faqs.answer: Not at all. Our user-friendly platform is built for solopreneurs with zero tech headaches or confusing jargon—get started in minutes.
faqs.question: Is it difficult to use?

faqs.answer: Yes! We offer flexible plans tailored to your unique goals so that you only invest in what truly fuels your solo success.
faqs.question: Can I have custom pricing?

faqs.answer: Definitely — jump in risk-free with our 14-day full-access trial, no credit card needed, cancel anytime.
faqs.question: Is there trial version available?

faqs.answer: Simply click “Join Now” at the top right or explore our plans page to pick the perfect fit for your solo venture.
faqs.question: Where do I sign up?

props.label: - MEET THE CREATOR
props.outro: I'm building Luke AI in public and sharing every step of my solopreneur journey. Explore the progress and share your feedback to help shape the future of marketing tools! 🚀
props.heading: Hey, I'm Luke
props.subtitle: Fueling solopreneur success.

paragraphs.value: As a solopreneur, I created Luke AI to empower solo business owners with smart, effortless marketing resources that save time and boost conversions.

- How can I create standout marketing fast?
- What tools turn ideas into customers?
My solution: smart design meets AI-driven content tailored for solopreneurs.

principles.title: No-fuss design
principles.description: Drag & drop simplicity so you focus on growth, not tech headaches.

principles.title: AI content that sells
principles.description: Generate headlines, copy, and CTAs designed to convert your ideal customers.

principles.title: Launch quickly, grow steadily
principles.description: Proven templates crafted to turn visitors into loyal clients in minutes.
